constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 45 (Wednesday, March 10, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. CAMMACK:
H.R. 1776.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the United States Constitution, including the
power granted under Article I, Section 8, Clause 18, and the
power granted to each House of Congress under Article I,
Section 5, Clause 2
[Page H1327]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Antitrust, Commercial, and Administrative Law.

title: Regulations from the Executive in Need of Scrutiny Act of 2021
